location: Empty duck coop planting area, MaMeeFarm, Thailand
title: rat_tailed_radish_planting_empty_duck_coop_area
summary: Planting of rat-tailed radish in an empty duck coop area previously cleared of basil.
description: This data unit documents the planting of rat-tailed radish (Raphanus rat-tailed) in an empty duck coop area. The planting location corresponds to the same soil area where basil plants were previously removed.

spatial_reference.note: Planting performed in the same physical area as referenced data units.

external_reference.note: External reference provided for verification only.
